1981-82 NBA Schedule and Results

1980-81 Schedule and Results 1982-83 Schedule and Results

League Champion: Los Angeles Lakers

Most Valuable Player: Moses Malone (31.1/14.7/1.8)

Rookie of the Year: Buck Williams (15.5/12.3/1.3)

PPG Leader: George Gervin (32.3)

RPG Leader: Moses Malone (14.7)

APG Leader: Johnny Moore (9.6)

WS Leader: Moses Malone (15.4)
